results.content: Very good. I would definitely recommend.

Pretty bad. Lots of typos which show how unrefined the course is. No asynchronous section which is a defining characteristic of JS. Very basic explanations... Almost like this was a copy and paste video form of W3 school minus the detailed theory.

Really disappointed. Course advertises itself with the width of an ocean but delivers with the depth of a puddle.
results.content_html:
Pretty bad. Lots of typos which show how unrefined the course is. No asynchronous section which is a defining characteristic of JS. Very basic explanations... Almost like this was a copy and paste video form of W3 school minus the detailed theory.

Really disappointed. Course advertises itself with the width of an ocean but delivers with the depth of a puddle.
